title: Łapy-Szołajdy
text:
Łapy-Szołajdy is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20%C5%81apy">Gmina Łapy</a>, within <a href="Bia%C5%82ystok%20County">Białystok County</a>, <a href="Podlaskie%20Voivodeship">Podlaskie Voivodeship</a>, in north-eastern Poland.
The village has a population of 483.
References.
<br>
